name: The Recycle Factory
description:
A humorous story about a human getting a job in the Companion Cube Recycle Factory. Controls are simple, just click on things or click and drag things. You can also click on the dialogue to speed it up.

This game was developed for the Wowie Jam 3.0, which ran from Feb 26 2021 to Feb 28 2021.

Music and Sound Effects Jamie Schippers (skipsabeatmusic.com) Sound Effects Greg Warren Programming and Design Trevor Self Unity Packages Used DoTween DoozyUI Yarn Spinner

Note: some additional art and audio effects by Kenney
